products.title: Women's Capri Triple
products.description: unlimited dimension with a fully perforated upper. Step in and out of any world you inhabit with total ease. One to file under essential for seasons/years to come.

products.title: Men's Capri Triple
products.description: The power of texture. Our bestselling style finds an unlimited dimension with a fully perforated upper. Step in and out of any world you inhabit with total ease. One to file under essential for seasons/years to come.

products.title: Women's Capri Rose Cloud
products.description: Soft and subtle yet powerful enough to make a statement. Crafted from extremely durable Italian calf suede the Capri Rose Cloud sits atop a Margom gum sole, one of the best in the business. Capri is built for whatever life throws your way—springtime now included.

products.title: Men's Verse
products.description: If subtlety is an art, Verso is a maestro. In Italian calf leather, it’s mid-top cut is designed to slim the foot. The result: peak sophistication, always. Wear on repeat from work to Sunday brunch.

products.title: Men's Metro Cream
products.description: The shoes match with everything and they’re very comfortable, they don’t give you blisters and they’re not hard to break in. I went a half size up bc of some reviews I read and they fit me perfectly.

products.title: VERSE WHITE
products.description: If subtlety is an art, Verso is a maestro. In white Italian calf leather, it’s mid-top cut is designed to slim the foot. The result: peak sophistication, always. Wear on repeat from work to Sunday brunch.

products.title: CAPRI SLATE MESHI
products.description: These sneakers just became your go-to staple piece. They will seamlessly fit into any wardrobe with its ability to compliment every outfit you put together. It’s a good thing they are made with premium Italian leather because you’ll never want to take them off.

products.title: CAPRI PRIMO CINEMA
products.description: The perfect Sunday afternoon. This classic blue is the epitome of a summer morning. It’s smooth leather upper gives it a classic finish, with unique white detailing on the heel. The Capri Sky Blue will lift you to cloud nine. Where will you go from there?
